name: Hot Dunk Basketball
description:
How many points you can score before time runs out? Download Hot Dunk Basketball and give it a try for the most addicting game ever!

Hot Dunk Basketball is very addicting game that anybody can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple, all you have to do is tap the screen to make the ball bounce a bit. When the ball is in the hoop you get the points and the hoop moves to another location.

But the game is not that easy... Every time you score a countdown will start and won't stop until you score again, at which point it will start over from the beginning. Each time countdown will keep getting shorter and shorter making the game more difficult. Rise to the challenge and beat your high score every time you play most addicting game Hot Dunk Basketball!

Game Features:
◉ Simple controls
◉ Quick and addicting game play session
◉ Cool balls collection
◉ Most addicting game with basketball
